headline.main: Taliban Fight On in Kandahar, Shakily

lead_paragraph: Fighting intensified in and around the Taliban stronghold of Kandahar today, and several reports suggested that the southern city and its airport might soon be wrested from Taliban control. Travelers arriving here from the city this evening described the desert town of mud and brick homes and a central ramshackle bazaar as extremely tense. The crackle of fighting resounded from the northeastern outskirts, the refugees said, and Taliban fighters appeared engaged in a desperate rear guard action to defend the longtime home of their leader, Mullah Muhammad Omar.
abstract: Fighting intensifies in and around Kandahar, Afghanistan, and several reports suggest that it may soon be wrested from Taliban control; if city falls, Taliban wll no longer hold major Afghan town and will be forced to flee; photo; map (M)
